Description_lang: Your spells have a chance to invoke the Heart of Light, radiating 500000 Holy damage over 6 sec to enemies within 8 yards. Nearby allies are healed for 25% of the damage dealt by the Heart of Light.
AuraDescription_lang: Your spells have a chance to invoke the Heart of Light, radiating 500000 Holy damage over 6 sec to enemies within 8 yards. Nearby allies are healed for 25% of the damage dealt by the Heart of Light.
